titleStmt.title: A copy of a letter written from His Majesties camp at Gerpines, by an officer, to a friend of his in London, dated July 31. new stile. 1691. Licensed, July 29. 1691. J.F.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J[ohn] Smith in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
